titles.title: To make the provisions of title IV of the Trade Act of 1974 applicable to Cambodia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 6/27/1994--Introduced. Declares that the human rights and emigration provisions of the Trade Act of 1974 shall apply to Cambodia for purposes of determining its eligibility to receive nondiscriminatory treatment (most-favored-nation) status.
